item.title: React and the annoyances of JSX
item.description: I’ve been writing a bunch of React code and a heap of JSX at work. React (coupled with Flux) has been a joy to work with. The uni-directional data flow makes understanding the state of your application at any point easy to understand. The gradual componentization of our UI codebase is a beautiful thing to witness. That, coupled with a component based CSS system (using BEM guidelines for naming classes) has removed the messy bleed over we were having with some of our old css code.
